item.title: ソースはこちらTwitterのリンダ・ヤッカリーノCEOは、投資家に対し、主要な広告保有会社が今すぐ広告休止を推奨していないと語り、動画とパートナーシップへの注力を強調した（Sheila Dang/Reuters）
item.description:
Sheila Dang / Reuters:
Source: Twitter CEO Linda Yaccarino tells investors no major ad holding firms are recommending an ad pause now and highlights a focus on video and partnerships  —  Twitter plans to focus on video, creator and commerce partnerships to revitalize the social media company's business beyond digital advertising …

item.title: 情報筋の話：トーマス・フォックスがアレクサンダー・マカスキルに加えてフォックス・ニュースを去った。両者はタッカー・カールソンのプロデューサーで、アビー・グロスバーグの訴訟の被告である（Katie Robertson/New York Times）。
item.description:
Katie Robertson / New York Times:
Sources: Thomas Fox has left Fox News, in addition to Alexander McCaskill; both were producers for Tucker Carlson and are defendants in Abby Grossberg's lawsuit  —  The departures are the latest fallout since the network sidelined Mr. Carlson in April.  —  Two top producers …

item.title: 12Mのフォロワーを持つTwitchストリーマー、xQcことFélix Lengyelが、オーストラリアのゲーム・ギャンブルサイトが支援するストリーミングサービスKickと〜1億ドルの契約を結ぶ（Kellen Browning/New York Times）。
item.description:
Kellen Browning / New York Times:
Félix Lengyel, aka xQc, a Twitch streamer with 12M followers, signs a ~$100M deal with Kick, a streaming service backed by Australian gaming and gambling sites  —  The deal signed by Félix Lengyel, known as xQc, matches traditional athletes' contracts, and is another sign …

item.title: [スレッド】米国検察、幹部の性犯罪疑惑を調査したNHPRのジャーナリスト2人に対する破壊行為に関連して3人の男性を起訴（David Enrich/@davidenrich)
item.description:
David Enrich / @davidenrich:
[Thread] US prosecutors charge three men in connection with vandalism against two NHPR journalists who had investigated an executive's alleged sexual misconduct  —  Breaking: Federal prosecutors in Boston have filed criminal charges against three men for a string of attacks on the homes of @laurenchooljian and another @NHPR journalist last year. Story coming soon @nytimes Here's the backstory on the attacks >> https://www.nytimes.com/...

item.title: 情報筋の話：Cineworld CEOとその経営陣は、7月にChapter 11から脱却した後、合わせて$30M-$35Mの現金支給を受け、同社を去る（Financial Times）
item.description:
Financial Times:
Sources: Cineworld CEO and his management team will receive a combined $30M-$35M cash payout to leave the company after it emerges from Chapter 11 in July  —  CEO Mooky Greidinger and his brother Israel to receive most of the cash after group emerges from Chapter 11

item.title: NC州高等裁判所の陪審は、閉園時間後に公園で行われた2021年の抗議活動を取材した記者2人を不法侵入で有罪とし、彼らは再び上訴している（Sarah Honosky/The Asheville Citizen Times）。
item.description:
Sarah Honosky / The Asheville Citizen Times:
An NC Superior Court jury finds two reporters guilty of trespassing for covering a 2021 protest in a park after its closing time; they are appealing, again  —  ASHEVILLE - After a weeklong trial and two hours of deliberation, a Superior Court jury found self-described leftist Asheville Blade …

item.title: ペンタゴン・ペーパーズをリークし、画期的な報道の自由に関する米国サウスカロライナ州判決をもたらし、報道の自由財団を設立したダニエル・エルズバーグ氏が92歳で死去（ワシントンポスト紙）
item.description:
Washington Post:
Daniel Ellsberg, who leaked the Pentagon Papers that led to a landmark press freedoms SCOTUS ruling and founded the Freedom of the Press Foundation, dies at 92  —  Disillusioned by the Vietnam War, he leaked a top-secret history of the conflict, leading to a landmark Supreme Court case

item.title: SEO専門家の「軍拡競争」によって、Google検索とウェブはゴミのようなテキストに溺れ、顧客と企業がお互いを見つけられなくなった（Mia Sato/The Verge）。
item.description:
Mia Sato / The Verge:
How the “arms race” of SEO experts has left Google Search and the web drowning in garbage text, resulting in customers and businesses failing to find each other  —  The SEO arms race has left Google and the web drowning in garbage text, with customers and businesses flailing to find each other.

item.title: オグルヴィ、AIが生成したインフルエンサーキャンペーンを明確に開示するAIアカウンタビリティコードの計画を示し、広告にAI「ウォーターマーク」を使用することを約束（フィナンシャルタイムズ紙）
item.description:
Financial Times:
Ogilvy sets out plans for an AI accountability code to clearly disclose AI-generated influencer campaigns and commits to using an AI “watermark” on its ads  —  Agency Ogilvy is pushing for more industry disclosure when lifelike virtual characters are used in ads

item.title: Southern California Public Radioが削減を計画している中、2021年の納税記録では、元CEOが引退中に〜580Kドル、別の幹部がパートタイムで働いて〜560Kドルを稼いでいた（The Wrap）。
item.description:
The Wrap:
As Southern California Public Radio plans cuts, tax records from 2021 show ex-CEO made ~$580K while retired and another exec made ~$560K working part-time  —  Tax returns show that two former public radio CEOs at NPR's affiliate LAist made massive salaries until 2021

item.title: ガーディアンは、AIに関する新しいポリシーの一環として、オリジナルのジャーナリズムに貢献し、修正や提案に役立つ場合にのみAIを使用するとしている（The Guardian）。
item.description:
The Guardian:
As part of its new policy on AI, The Guardian says it will use AI only when it contributes to original journalism and to help with corrections and suggestions  —  Over the last three months, colleagues from our editorial, creative, engineering, product, legal, commercial and partnerships teams …

item.title: ボリス・ジョンソン、デイリー・メール紙に週刊コラムニストとして参加。"完全な無修正のもの "を書く。
item.description:
The Guardian:
Boris Johnson joins The Daily Mail as a weekly columnist to write “completely unexpurgated stuff”, a day after a report found he deliberately misled parliament  —  Acoba says former PM has clearly broken rules by not telling it about column until half an hour before it was publicly announced

item.title: ガネットは第4四半期にUSA Todayの記事の箇条書き要約を作成するAIツールを発売する予定で、記事を様々な形式に分割するツールを開発している（Helen Coster/Reuters）
item.description:
Helen Coster / Reuters:
Gannett plans to launch an AI tool to create bulleted summaries of USA Today articles in Q4 and is developing a tool to break stories into various formats  —  Publisher Gannett plans to include generative artificial intelligence in the system it uses to publish stories as it and other news organizations begin …

item.title: 2022年9月期の英インディペンデントは、売上高が前年同期比12%増の£46.3M、うち57%が広告以外、営業利益が同65%減の£1.9M（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
In the year to September 2022, the UK's Independent reports revenue up 12% YoY to £46.3M, of which 57% was non-ad, and operating profit down 65% YoY to £1.9M  —  Operating profit was down 65% due to investment in areas such as e-commerce, Independent TV and the US.

item.title: 情報源: News CorpやThe Guardianなどのメディア企業は、OpenAI、Google、Microsoft、AdobeとLLMの著作権問題や購読料について話し合っている（Financial Times)
item.description:
Financial Times:
Sources: media companies like News Corp and The Guardian have discussed LLM copyright issues and a subscription fee with OpenAI, Google, Microsoft, or Adobe  —  Google and OpenAI are discussing agreements to pay publishers over using content to train generative AI models
